programme.title: One Royal Holiday
programme.desc: When Anna offers a stranded mother and son shelter from a blizzard, she learns that they are the royal family of Galwick and that they are both in need of a little Christmas magic.

programme.desc: Rose has to go and get a job when she loses her late husband's pension, where she is confronted for the first time by ageism.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Van builds a new home office in the garage so he and Reba can be more productive, but Reba has a difficult time juggling family and the additional workload.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Kyra moves back in with Reba, who catches her drinking; Brock and Barbra Jean confess that they let Kyra have an occasional beer in their house.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba and Van end their real estate partnership; Barbra Jean auditions to be the new weather girl at a local TV station.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba deals with Kyra and Cheyenne, who are at odds because Kyra feels her sister can not get enough of the family spotlight.

programme.desc: Frasier prepares his son (Trevor Einhorn) for the National Spelling Bee finals.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: When Frasier and Niles discover a skull at their childhood home, they try to deduce what they imagine to be a murder.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: When Frasier renews his feud with an upstairs neighbor (Brian Stokes Mitchell), Martin begins dating the neighbor's mother in a ploy to diffuse their rivalry.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: While in Boston on business, Frasier reunites with Carla (Rhea Perlman), Cliff (John Ratzenberger) and Norm (George Wendt) from Cheers.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Rebecca is upset when the press has a field day with her former rival, who identifies herself as Robin Colcord's true love.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Cliff has his visiting mother (Frances Sternhagen) stay at Woody's place.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Kyra posts a video of Van on the Internet; Reba advises Brock to make a romantic gesture in order to save his marriage.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Barbra Jean suspects that the station's new intern was brought in to be her successor.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba discovers that Brock has been living secretly in the garage for several days to spend time apart from Barbra Jean.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba finds the perfect first home for Cheyenne and Van, but Cheyenne discovers that her high-school rival is selling it.

programme.title: A Royal Winter
programme.desc: A woman (Merritt Patterson) flees to Europe for some soul searching and meets a handsome playboy prince who exposes her to a world she has never before known.

programme.title: A Royal Runaway Romance
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a princess and her bodyguard after her budding romance with an artist fizzles out.

programme.title: Royal-ish
programme.desc: Lacey is an amusement park princess who befriends eight-year-old Rose, a real-life princess and is recruited by her handsome father to travel to their kingdom and be the new governess.

programme.title: The Royal We
programme.desc: When her older sister elopes with a non-royal, Princess Bea, who has lived her life away from her royal duties, must step in and honor the arranged marriage to a small kingdom prince.

programme.title: The Reluctant Royal
programme.desc: Philadelphia mechanic Johnny learns his estranged father is a duke. The duke surprises him, as do his feelings for advisor Prudence.

programme.title: Royal Matchmaker
programme.desc: A struggling matchmaker is hired by a king to find his son a suitable wife in time for a national celebration. As the clock ticks toward the deadline, the matchmaker finds him the perfect wife -- only to realize that she's fallen in love with him.

programme.title: Love on the Danube: Royal Getaway
programme.desc: A jilted art gallery manager takes her honeymoon cruise solo and meets a charming prince posing as a European gentleman, who shares her passion for art.

programme.title: Love in the Clouds
programme.desc: Reporter Brooklyn travels to the Balloon Fiesta to meet hot air balloon pilot Jared, who offers romantic balloon rides but is closed off to love himself.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy's beau gives up a lucrative legal practice to become a circus clown.

programme.desc: Rose feels insecure about her romance with a college professor.

programme.desc: Blanche turns the tables and proposes to her brother-in-law.

programme.desc: Dorothy decides to do something with her life by signing up for a comedy spot at the Comedy Barrel, but Sophia is unimpressed; Blanche is having tax problems, but decides it's nothing that a negligee won't put right.

programme.desc: Kyra tells Reba and Brock that she is postponing college to tour with her band; Cheyenne and Van cannot agree on how to decorate their new house.

programme.title: Napa Ever After
programme.desc: An attorney takes a sabbatical from her job to renovate a winery she inherits in Napa Valley. With the help of a handsome local, she learns more about the grandmother she hardly knew, while opening herself up to a love like she has never known.

programme.title: Autumn in the Vineyard
programme.desc: A man and woman with a strained history learn to trust each other when their dreams bring them together to turn a ranch into an award-winning winery.

programme.title: The Perfect Pairing
programme.desc: A food and wine critic falls for a single father after she bumps her head and loses her memory.

programme.desc: Aspiring master sommelier Jenna returns to her family vineyard to study and is intrigued by the natural methods of the handsome Argentinian winemaker Marcelo.

programme.desc: Needing to win some accolades for her masterfully made pinots, a winemaker from Oregon travels to Paris to compete in a major wine competition.
